snippet: A video circulated online alleges that Planned Parenthood is guilty of the crime of selling fetal remains. The organization denies the claim.
abstract: Anti-abortion activist group Center for Medical Progress releases video that shows Planned Parenthood official explaining how organization provides medical researchers with fetal body parts; video accuses Planned Parenthood of illegally selling parts, despite fact that doctor in video states that cost researchers pay is for clinic expenses.
lead_paragraph: A video circulated online alleges that Planned Parenthood is guilty of the crime of selling fetal remains. The organization denies the claim.

headline.main: Video Accuses Planned Parenthood of Crime
